title: OpenVPN - Overview
description: This dashboard provides an overview of OpenVPN logs.

definition.content:
OpenVPN is a free, open-source protocol that creates secure connections between devices over the internet. It's used to create virtual private networks (VPNs).


The OpenVPN Overview dashboard provides insights into the logs generated by OpenVPN.


For more information, see the [OpenVPN Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/openvpn/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates the OpenVPN logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).

definition.title: Client VPN Authentication and Connection Logs
Successful Client VPN Logins Over Time
Successful Client VPN Logins by Authentication Method
Total Failed Client VPN Login Attempts
Failed Client VPN Logins Over Time

search.query: source:openvpn @reason:"DENY: user in deny list." @log_type:"AUTH ERROR" $User $Client-IP $Log-Type $Authentication-Method $OS $Host-Name

definition.title: Top Users with Missing Password Digest Causing Local Auth Failures

search.query: source:openvpn @reason:"local auth failed: no stored password digest found in authcred attributes." @log_type:"AUTH ERROR" $User $Client-IP $Log-Type $Authentication-Method $OS $Host-Name

definition.title: Common Reasons of Client VPN Login Failures

query.query_string: source:openvpn @log_type:("VPN Auth Failed" OR "AUTH SUCCESS" OR "AUTH ERROR" OR "Peer Connection Initiated" OR "client-instance exiting" OR "Assigning virtual IP") $User $Client-IP $Log-Type $Authentication-Method $OS $Host-Name
